successes.title: Somabar: Robotic Bartender for your Home
successes.description: Somabar is a Wi-Fi connected craft cocktail appliance created specifically for the home kitchen.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU: Your help at any level brings us that much closer to getting Somabar to a home kitchen near you! We will feature you on our website as a Somabar Backer and keep you informed of all our backer exclusive updates!
STARTER SWAG: We are going to send you one very cool American Apparel T-Shirt with our logo and keep you informed of all of our updates.
COCKTAIL SWAG: Somabar glass set, muddler and garnish station to get you started making craft cocktails right away! (Shipping paid separately)

EARLY BIRD: Get your very own Somabar for $100 less than the pre-order price. Now you can finally make craft cocktails in your home kitchen at the press of a button! Comes with six SOMA PODS and a bitters POD.

EARLY BIRD: Get your very own Somabar for $100 less than the pre-order price. Now you can finally make craft cocktails in your home kitchen at the press of a button! Comes with six SOMA PODS and a bitters POD. (Shipping paid separately)

INTERNATIONAL EARLY BIRD: We want everyone to enjoy the taste of a perfect craft cocktail, but shipping is expensive outside the U.S., and may be far more than $100 depending on country. So please pick this level if you are international, as we may have to charge more for shipping depending on your country. Comes with six SOMA PODS and a bitters POD. (Shipping paid separately)
SUPER EARLY BIRD + ALL SWAG: Get your SOMABAR plus 2 t-shirts, glass set, muddler and garnish station! Comes with six SOMA PODS and a bitters POD. (Shipping paid separately)
SOMABAR REGULAR BIRD: Get your SOMABAR $200 less than the retail price of $699! Comes with six SOMA PODS and a bitters POD. Get ready for amazing craft cocktails! (Shipping paid separately)

INTERNATIONAL REGULAR BIRD: We want everyone to enjoy the taste of a perfect craft cocktail, but shipping is expensive outside the U.S., and may be far more than $100 depending on country. Get your SOMABAR $200 less than the retail price of $699! Comes with six SOMA PODS and a bitters POD. Get ready for amazing craft cocktails! (Shipping paid separately)
5 SOMABARS: Maybe you throw the biggest parties ever or want to give a few friends the coolest gift possible. Either way, you can buy 5 and save some $. (Shipping paid separately)

SOMABAR AMAZING FAN: We will PERSONALLY fly out to you and tend your bar at your next event with the only SOMABAR prototype in the world! You will also get one of the very first SOMABARS personally numbered and signed by us and all the SOMABAR swag. We will even name a drink after you and program it into our app for the world to see. (Shipping paid separately)
